|blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Atizapán de Zaragoza is a city, in State of Mexico in Mexico. The area of the city is 91.07 km². In 2010, the population was 489,937. == Government == Mayor Periodo Juan Antonio Domínguez Zambrano 2000-2003 Salvador Vázquez y Herrera 2003-2006 Gonzalo Alarcon Bardena 2006-2009 Jesus David Castañeda Degado 2009-2012 Pedro David Rodríguez Villegas 2012-2015 Ana María Balderas Trejo 2015-2018 Ruth Olvera Nieto 2018-2021 Pedro David Rodríguez Villegas 2021-2024 == Demography == Settlements Population Total Municipality 833,779 Ciudad López Mateos 792,211 Condado de Sayavedra 6,294 ==References==
